review_text: I chose to stay at Gene & Chasity's based on the convenience of the location in relation to a wedding I was attending in downtown Hickory. After looking through the listing pictures and reading all the excellent reviews, it was an easy choice. Considering that the wedding I was attending had been postponed 3 times due to covid, therefore my reservation dates kept changing, I can attest to the wonderful communication and willingness to help provided by the host. Upon my arrival, I knew immediately that I had struck Airbnb gold. The pictures do not give justice to this groovy, cozy apartment and their warm and inviting home. I cannot stress enough how CLEAN everything is. However, this is not a sterile, boring, run of the mill hotel suite, this is a delightful, private apartment in a lovely (& safe) neighborhood, that feels like home. All of the little things you forgot (or didn't even know you needed!) are provided in the space; their attention to the tiniest of details is exceptional. You can also set the temperature to your own desire (air & heat). Water is hot and plentiful (heads up- it is a smallish stand-up shower, but not a problem for me). With a comfortable bed (I chose the king) and the quiet location, you will sleep like a baby here. For dog lovers- Valentina is the sweetest girl, but if (for some strange reason that I can't understand), you're not an animal person, you'll never know she's there. Smoker's & vapor's- there is a nice patio table/ chairs in the inviting yard where you won't feel like an outcast getting your fix. Families with kids- child friendly. Everyone else- all are warmly welcomed here. Book this one with confidence....
